LanguageData.ATR_RestartRequiredSectionDesc: Any changes to settings in this section require restarting the game.
LanguageData.ATR_RestartRequiredPostDesc: Some changed settings require restarting the game for safety.
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsFixedGenderSelector: All androids are male (false) or female (true)
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsGenderRatio: Chance for android to pick male gender vs female gender
LanguageData.ATR_PlayerOnlyNote: If disabled, androids will only exist when built by the player
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsAppearNaturally: Androids can appear as parts of factions or events
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidFactionSettings: What role do android factions play? Only affects NEW games
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidRaidersExist: Androids have formed their own pirate collective
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidUnionistsExist: Androids dedicated to collective survival have unified
LanguageData.ATR_bedRestrictionDefaultsToAll: Beds default to All pawns rather than Mechanical/Organic
LanguageData.ATR_bedRestrictionDefaultsToAllDesc: By default, charging beds from this mod default to mechanical only, and all other beds default to organic only.
LanguageData.ATR_isUsingCustomConsiderations: Using custom config and will not reset: {0}
LanguageData.ATR_isUsingCustomConsiderationsDesc: If false, ATR will automatically regenerate what is/isn't mechanical at game startup so that it can catch new modded races for you.
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidFactionsNeverFlee: Android factions never flee from battle
LanguageData.ATR_factionsWillDeclareRightsWars: Factions will declare war over rights disputes
LanguageData.ATR_factionsWillDeclareRightsWarsDesc: Factions that are anti-mechanical or anti-organic will declare war on you if you have mechanical/organic colonists
LanguageData.ATR_dronesTriggerRightsWars: Anti-mechanical factions declare war over drones
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidOnlyNotice: Note: Only units marked as androids are affected by this. Drones have no such needs.
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedJoy: Androids need to fulfill joy needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedBeauty: Androids need to fulfill beauty needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedComfort: Androids need to fulfill comfort needs
LanguageData.ATR_AndroidsNeedOutdoors: Androids need to fulfill outdoors/indoors needs
LanguageData.ATR_wattsConsumedPerBodySize: Power use per 1 body size when charging [default: 500]
LanguageData.ATR_batteryPercentagePerRareTick: Percentage of battery charged per Rare Tick (~4 seconds) [default: 7%]
LanguageData.ATR_mechanicalsHaveDifferentBioprocessin: Mechanical units handle nutrition differently than organics.
LanguageData.ATR_ChanceAlliesInterceptHack: Chance to intercept hacks against you per allied faction
LanguageData.ATR_ChanceAlliesInterceptHackDesc: Percent chance that allied factions will save you from a successful enemy hack, preventing damage and actually giving you security points. This is PER ALLY.
LanguageData.ATR_PointsGainedOnInterceptPercentage: Points gained when allies intercept as percentage of attack
LanguageData.ATR_PointsGainedOnInterceptPercentageDes: When an ally intercepts an attack against you, they donate security points to you. This controls what percentage of the raid points they give you.
LanguageData.ATR_EnemyHackAttackStrengthModifierDesc: Multiplicative modifier on how many hacking points enemy hacking incidents will have. Less than 100% reduces intensity, greater than 100% raises intensity.
LanguageData.ATR_PercentageOfValueUsedForRansoms: Percentage of item value demanded in ransom attack
LanguageData.ATR_receiveFullHackingAlert: Alert for hacking points exceeding 90% of capacity.
LanguageData.ATR_RetaliationChanceOnFailure: Chance the target faction will retaliate on a failed hack
LanguageData.ATR_MinHackSuccessChance: Minimum chance of a successful hack
LanguageData.ATR_MaxHackSuccessChance: Maximum chance of a successful hack
LanguageData.ATR_showMechanicalSurgerySuccessChance: Display success chance of completed mechanical surgeries.
LanguageData.ATR_maxChanceMechanicOperationSuccess: Max success change for mechanical surgeries
LanguageData.ATR_chanceFailedOperationMinor: Chance failed mechanical surgeries are minor [default 75%]
LanguageData.ATR_chancePartSavedOnFailure: Chance that parts are returned from failed mechanical surgeries [default 75%]
LanguageData.ATR_receiveMaintenanceFailureLetters: Receive letters about maintenance-related health issues.
LanguageData.ATR_maintenancePartFailureRateFactor: How long before poor maintenance can result in part failures and the odds that no failure occurs
LanguageData.ATR_maintenanceGainRateFactor: How quickly maintenance is gained when doing maintenance
LanguageData.ATR_hediffBlacklistWarning: Warning: The longer the list of blacklisted hediffs is, the more performance impact on the game it will have.
LanguageData.ATR_minGroupSizeForSurrogates: Number of members for faction groups to spawn with surrogates
LanguageData.ATR_minSurrogatePercentagePerLegalGroup: Minimum percentage of surrogates in legal groups [default 20%]
LanguageData.ATR_maxSurrogatePercentagePerLegalGroup: Maximum percentage of surrogates in legal groups [default 70%]
LanguageData.ATR_displaySurrogateControlIcon: Display floating icon above controlled surrogates.
LanguageData.ATR_receiveFullSkillAlert: Alert for skill points exceeding 90% of capacity.
LanguageData.ATR_skillPointInsertionRate: Amount of skill points used per insertion [default: 100]
LanguageData.ATR_skillPointConversionRate: Amount of base XP generated per skill point [default: 0.5]
LanguageData.ATR_passionSoftCap: Passion soft-cap before cost increases per passion [default: 8]
LanguageData.ATR_basePointsNeededForPassion: Base skill points needed per passion [default: 5000]
LanguageData.ATR_UploadingKills: Uploading to SkyMind turns the initiator's body into a blank.
LanguageData.ATR_UploadingPermakills: Uploading to SkyMind leaves the initiator's body completely useless and dead.
LanguageData.ATR_SkyMindOperationTimeRequired: Hours required to complete SkyMind operations [default: 24]
LanguageData.ATR_traitBlacklistWarning: Warning: The longer the list of blacklisted traits is, the more performance impact on the game it will have.
